product_name: Oakley Backhand Black Snowflake Sunglasses - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: With a smaller frame fitted for a woman's face, these classic sunglasses serve up all day comfort with a stress-resistant frame and a 3-point fit that hold lenses in precise optical alignment.
short_description: With a smaller frame fitted for a woman's face, these classic sunglasses serve up all day comfort with a stress-resistant frame and a 3-point fit that hold lenses in precise optical alignment.
